Name: Lines Infinite
About the game: Lines Infinite is a Numberlink-based puzzle game involving finding paths to connect colored tiles in a grid. 100 brain-teasing Numberlink puzzles of different shapes Random level generator Beautiful abstract design, 10 color themes 8 ambient relaxing soundtracks 100 achievements with Latin & Cyrillic characters 15 Trading Cards, Badge, Emoticons and Backgrounds (Coming soon) Cross-platform saves via Steam Cloud Windows, Mac & Linux Play 100 more levels - Lines X Get both with 25% discount - Lines Bundle
Meta Title: Lines Infinite: Nov 24, 2017, Konstructors and Full Overview
